meanings.definition: The act of putting seeds or young plants into the ground to grow.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy planting flowers in my garden every spring.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's planting of corn seeds led to a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's planting of acorns all over the yard created a surprise oak forest.
meanings.sent4: Her planting of kindness in people's hearts blossomed into friendships.
meanings.sent5: The magical planting of a single bean sprout grew into a towering beanstalk.

meanings.definition: The act of establishing or setting something in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The city's planting of new trees along the street beautified the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The careful planting of the flag marked the explorer's claim on the new land.
meanings.sent3: The pirate's planting of a fake treasure map led to hilarious confusion.
meanings.sent4: His planting of doubt in her mind grew into a forest of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ritual involved the planting of a sacred stone at the mountain peak.
